title: Right Now
lyrics:
Tell me, baby, are you coming over here?
I wanna take you from the front door, lay you on the sofa, yeah
Yeah, he might have played the background but I'ma get control of ya
But your body on lockdown, you ain't tapping out 'til it's over, yeah
And girl, you make me pray every night

Damn, your thighs lead me up to Heaven

And baby, I can't even lie

You're the one thing on my mind



Oh girl, I want your love right now

Yeah, you know, yeah, you know

I wanna lay you down

It's a ceiling, the feeling gets deeper, babe

Deeper 'til we drown

Yeah, you know, yeah, you know

I want your love right now (Love)



Yeah, you know, yeah, you know

I want your love

Yeah, you know, yeah, you know

I want your love



It's a problem when we're together, yeah

See, I can do it on my own

Baby girl, you make it better, yeah

Oh, you know I don't stop

I give off giving you all of this pleasure, yeah

Hit it three, four times

Wake it up, ready for another session, yeah



And girl, you make me pray every night

Damn, your thighs lead me up to Heaven

And baby, I can't even lie

You're the one thing on my mind



Oh girl, I want your love right now

Yeah, you know, yeah, you know

I wanna lay you down

It's a ceiling, the feeling gets deeper, babe

Deeper 'til we drown

Yeah, you know, yeah, you know

I want your love right now (Love)



Yeah, you know, yeah, you know

I want your love



Do you feel it? All the anticipation

Baby, don't keep me waiting

Hold your line too long (Love)

'Cause you're looking like it would be amazing

Baby, don't keep me waiting

Hold your line too long



Yeah, you know, yeah, you know

I want your love

I want your love
